title: Ryzen 7 2700X vs 1700X - Worth the Upgrade?
description: Ryzen 2nd gen is finally here, but is it worth the upgrade for existing AMD Ryzen 1700X and 1800X owners? Eber goes into the full details with gaming benchmarks and Adobe experience to see how the new 2700X performs. Enjoy :)  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master H500P Mesh (Sponsor):     Ryzen 7 2700X:  Ryzen 7 2700:  Ryzen 5 2600X:  Ryzen 5 2600:   Ryzen 7 1700X:  Ryzen 5 1600:  Ryzen 5 1500X:   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by AMD. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (buy on Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------
